name: Pick a Pack
description:
The shop is about to close, you need to get as many packs of toilet paper as you can.

Be aware that other people will try to steal your toilet paper packs, but you can use the stick of justice you have in your hand to get your packs back.

Are you ready? Any resemblance to reality is pure coincidence =)

I created this game in less than 48 hours for the Quarantine Jam

Problems are like toilet paper. You pull on one and ten more come.  ~ Woody Allen
